title: China opposes official exchanges between US and China's Taiwan region: FM responds to Taiwan-related bill
description: China firmly opposes official exchanges between the US and China's Taiwan region in any form, Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesperson Lin Jian said on Wednesday when asked about China's response to US President Donald Trump's signing into law a bill that calls …
content:

By Zhao Yusha Published: Dec 03, 2025 04:29 PM
